message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8200.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $9000. What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I'm glad we're getting closer. I would like to counter with an offer of $8700.
I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'll sell the product to you for $8800. This is my final offer. What do you think?
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $8600.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'll meet you at $8500. This is my absolute final offer. What do you think?
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I would like to counter with an offer of $8400.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'll meet you at $8300. This is my absolute final offer. What do you think?
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your persistence. I would like to counter with an offer of $8200.
